casebody.data:
EDWIN L. MAYER, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. FAIRLAWN JEWISH CENTER AND RANDALL CONSTRUCTION CO., INC., DEFENDANTS-PETITIONERS. Messrs. Morrison, Lloyd •& Griggs, Mr. J. Chester Massinger and Mr. James B. Emory for the petitioners. Messrs. Gross & Stavis and Miss Mabel L. Richardson for the respondent. March 26, 1962.

See same case below: 71 N. J. Super. 313.
